name: xRWA
description: xRWA - Real World Asset Tokenization Platform

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:contract"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contract && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contract && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf back/node_modules front/node_modules contract/node_modules back/dist front/.next contract/artifacts contract/cache
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd back && npm install && cd ../front && npm install && cd ../contract && npm install

author: xRWA Team
